content: Those snack and drink ideas sound perfect for the game night. I think I'll go with a mix of savory and sweet options, and set up a few stations on the coffee table with labels so everyone can help themselves. By the way, speaking of the coffee table, I'm really glad I got rid of that old one from my parents. It was taking up too much space in my living room and didn't really fit with my new decor. The new one is so much better for hosting gatherings like this.
